title: [BUG]  Unable to add SKiaSharp to the GAC
body:
**Description**

I am trying to install SkiaSharp into the CAG for an internal WPF application.  However, libSkiaSharp cannot be added to the GAC becuase it does not have an assembly manafest.

**Code**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/835562/86440925-93f4da80-bcc8-11ea-8975-6b162d87f530.png)


**Expected Behavior**

Add SkiaSharp to the GAC

**Actual Behavior**

Cannot be added to the GAC

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  1.68.3
- IDE: Windows CLI
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Windows Classic:  Windows 10 - .NET 7.2
